item.title: COVID AT OLYMPIC VILLAGE
item.description:
apnews.com

item.title: TOYOTA PULLS ADS
item.description:
apnews.com
TOKYO (AP) — Toyota won’t be airing any Olympic-themed advertisements on Japanese television during the Tokyo Games despite being one of the IOC’s top corporate sponsors. The extraordinary decision by the country’s top automaker underlines how polarizing the Games have become in Japan as COVID-19 infections rise ahead of Friday’s opening ceremony.
